caption: This brewery is great. Their 210 blonde is a personal fav. My husband really enjoyed the beers he had, great atmosphere but they could upgrade the size of the venue.
Love!

When we first arrived, there was a bit of a wait due to the bartender getting backed up with orders, but when we ordered all of our drinks they came out fast and at the same time. We got one order of the girl scout cookie flight, which came …
Nice

Visited about a week ago, from Boerne,  with my girlfriend and though the place was a little tough to find, the beer was great and the bartender was very friendly. The expansion looks good. Prices are very reasonable. We filled up 4 …

I don't know where these reviews are coming from. The beer was super watered down. Lacked flavor. There's no parking. If you sit at the bar the menu for all the beers are on a tv behind you instead of the one in front of you and it jumps …
This place is great the beer is amazing the bar tenders are great and they have a food truck onsite! The Taco Spot
Great beer, servos and company. Everyone is excited to be at work and tell you the story of how the brewery got it's name. You'll have to go to learn the lore.
Not a very nice brewery location and the beer was, at best, ok. We didn't even finish our glasses, I think they might need to clean their lines
Cool place with a nice selection of beers!
Great selection of beers, flights are 9 different choices... great costumer service and chill atmosphere!!!!

This is a great little brewery. Very affordable, great tasting beer. It looked like they did some recent remodeling; new picnic tables, TVs, bar in the back room. The bartender provided amazing service. Overall I would recommend.
Really great place great service

Great little spot that’ll only get better once the new area is complete. Good brews and good people! IPA’s were our fav. The walk around brewery was cool as well! You can get a flight of everything on the wall for $15 which is a pretty good deal and decent amount of beer! 🍻
Service was great and the atmosphere was on point. Be sure to ask about the dirty girl you wont regret it... 😂
Great service every time I've visited. Their events are always so much fun! And their beer is one of the best in SA! I always tell people to stop by.

Owner nice. Friendly staff. Under construction but I’m here for the beer not the scenery. It seems like they brew their own beer in the next room, that’s fresh. Small section for now but quality is above expectations. Give it time his place will be hopping.

June 2018  Finally, after not making it on our run through San Antonio last year, we found a time to try Busted Sandal Brewing. We got there just a bit after opening and had to wait a few minutes to be served because they weren’t quite …
Great beers and nice staff
Nice in weekend .. good to start your night there for warming up 😉 they close at 10 pm
Beer was great, friendly staff, a must check out scene
Loved the vibe. Super friendly and delicious beer.

Awesome TheY have a sampler of all brews for $15.00. Friendly crowd, small brewhouse feel. GOOGLE MAPS NAVIGATION IS A BIT OFF, TRICKY TO GET TO BUT WORTH IT TO FIND. IT IS LOCATED WITHIN A WAREHOUSE CIRCLE.
Lacks options for those not drinking beer (topo chico, soda), also lacks snacks... with that said, a solid brewery with inventive beers. Worth a visit or a few & great events.
They're expanding. It's a little rough right now.
Great brewery. Friendly bartender and great beer. Perfect for those who love a lively local brewery with some friendly faces.
Prices are absolutely fair, great ambiance, excellent choices, amazing taste. Would recommend to anyone

Definitely needs a big upgrade inside with a small bar but is on it's way with new construction. Very friendly bartender and Some of the best local beers on tap, loved the hop dong IPA. Please work on better signs. If you go, turn right as you enter the shabby business complex and don't be discouraged...great beer awaits!
Fantastic service and great experience to regulars. Eric is amazing at customer service 👍🏼
They make some really good beers here and have a wide variety. Eric, the bartender, was very friendly and made the experience and visit very pleasurable.

IPA 7.1abv pretty good, light hop nose and back with low bitter finish (nothing to go out of your way for) 16oz ; (overrated at 4.5*) - good WiFi, no outdoor seating, cannot see from the street very hard to find no signage, some parking, a work in progress 5 TV's but 4 not cabled
Hidden brewery near the I-10 and 410.  Small cozy, friendly crowd .  Pet friendly as well.  Wide variety of brews...only 3 of which I liked.  Worth a stop in though.

A small but darn fine little brewery. I really like their 210 and slippery Rock, and I can get both locally. Tried the porter recently and it was real good. And even tho their open hours are short, it's worth a trip to their tasting room. Nice people, good company and delicious beer. And grab you a sixer at HEB too.
Nice little place to chill at. They are still working on building the extension to the main bar but it's a nice place where you can meet some cool people.
Hard to find. Looks like not in a safe spot. But beers are good, selection awesome. Kegs should be colder. Going to be awesome when it gets finished!
Nice tap room, intimate setting.  Personable staff.

A flight of all 9 quality Crafted beers ...$15.   Eric, the bartender, was amazing at explaining.   Small place.  They are expanding.   All the beers from the lightest to the darkest were very tasty.  A little hard to find.  It's tucked away.  In a cul de sac of buildings.

Busted Sandal is a small venue more suited to locals on weekends.  I was with some friends, one of them a 25-year brewmaster and brewery owner.  They had 9 of their beers on tap so we had the 9-beer flight.  All of the beers were very well …

Great atmosphere and friendly bartenders! This is a small tasting room, so don’t go expecting a bar scene (although they are expanding!). The staff is always willing to help if you don’t know what to pick. We come here every chance we get.

Wow! What can I say? I came in expecting the usual brewery.... I came out making friends, tasting a ton of beer, eating birthday cake (not kidding) and having a great time with a friend. Do you need any more reasons to come here and taste their delicious and unique beer?
The best local brewery bin San Antonio, delicious beer and friendly staff
we went to the regae music festival and met great people and shared great beer. the pumpkin porter was good and I never drink dark beer.
Always a good time with great bartenders and good brews.  Popping in for a quick one is always a nice way to end a Wednesday or Friday work day.
Great spot!

Walked into the taproom and immediately felt like family. These guys go above and beyond to really care for their customers. They stayed open an extra hour just to talk to us and let us try their new beer.  Not to mention every single beer …
Great beer! Great place to visit so please make a trip here!!!!
Friendly folks but an uninformed Beto supporter
Nice cozy brewery. A hidden jem off of Oaklawn. There tan lines pale ale is one of the few pale ales that hit it out of the park for me.
Excellent beer, Eric was amazing, greeted usbin seconds, was passionate about the beer and even gave us a mini tour!  Definately a must see visit...

This brewery makes some good brews and deserves some attention!  As others have mentioned, it’s on the smallish side, but the good news is, they’ve busted down the walls and have expanded into the space next door. It’s not finished out yet, …
This is what beer dreams are made of!!
Hard to find,  but good beer. Once construction is done inside will be very nice.

Great microbrewery has the best small taproom in San Antonio. Construction still in progress to expand their seating area. Signatures brews are the 210 Ale & the Slippery Rock IPA. My personal favorites are two of their seasonal "Chanclas" …
Awesome beer great people. This brewery is a local favorite.
Great service.  Marissa is the best!
Good beer,  friendly staff.
Great beer!
Great small Brewery. Expanding taproot very soon. I would highly recommended this place.
Great core selection that fulfills the pallet —thanks
beer is fresh and cold, staff is friendly. a great place for a cold beer.
Amazing beer and amazing people. Very welcoming, great conversation, and everything I tried was delicious. You can't beat that.
Amazing people! Friendly. Fun. Great beers! Well worth visiting.
No sevric at all had to leave with out ordering. The girls who normally work the bar are amazing must be a off night for busted sandle

Went for octoberfest. The beer was super foamy - I bought one of the steins for 40$ and it was half filled with foam unfortunately. The beer was "meh" the watermelon beer tasted like they brewed an ale and just added watermelon flavoring extract.  The place is also very small - I probably won't be going back.
Small, crowded, descent.

We love this place!  It's hard to find and sometimes cramped, but if you can get past that, the beer is fantastic, prices reasonable, and you'll meet the entire Busted Sandal team within your first couple visits. Also, everyone there is super friendly.
Nice small and quaint very friendly atmosphere... They need better signage slightly hard to find.
I love beer.  The atmosphere was fun.  The staff was knowledgeable and friendly.  We had a great time.  I just prefer a different kind of beer.  Just my preference.
Really enjoyed these beers!

Excellent small brewery to visit. Not a lot of room inside but they run events that are fun to go to. If you ever see their beer in a bar give it a try, it's delicious. Edit: it's a few months later and I'm here for porter palooza and they …
Bought a 6 pack from the local store and 4 out of the 6 exploded in the car on the way home. One of them in my hand as I was trying to pick them up. 0 out of 10, would not recommend.
These folks know beer. One of the best microbreweries in Texas. Tell them Martin sent you.
Make some of my favorite beers
From Colorado great place for how small it is. Good beer, very friendly place as well as a very cute bartender.(female one)
Good guys
Amazing beer
Really good beer, and friendly staff,  the taproom is small right now but they are looking to  make it bigger!
Definitely a great experience!!  The Art Show on Saturday was a blast......Looking forward to hanging out and drinking some awesome craft with them again :)
Cool little spot. Very hidden.
Very good beer. Great staff. Finding Friday Lager was my bag
Sucks. There are much better brews out there from No Label, Ranger Creek, Independence,  Alamo, and Middleton Brewing just to name a few.  Don't bother with these guys.
A great San Antonio brewery. The taproom is very small, but the beer makes up for it. They have had some good open houses outside where there's much more room.
Awesome Pumpkin Porter and very nice folks. Too bad they aren't distributing this far north yet,
When I visit from Fort Worth I'm always pleased with their beers and the crowds. Great beer guys!
Knowledgeable bar tender, solid beer, but a very small tap room. Certainly not a bad stop for an out-of-towner though!
Great beers.  Small room.  Put a few more bar stools in and a lighted open sign as the front is dark.  Do that and 5 stars!

I was so happy to find this great little brewery operation right in my neighborhood. It's a tiny venue that fits maybe 15 people, standing room only. They have a bar where you can sample their brews. The prices are fair and the beer is …
Support local brews!
